inn1.comm: a good length on off stump with some shape back into the left-hander after angling across, de Kock stays in his crease and plays the ball towards midwicket
slants wide across the left-hander this time from over the wicket, the batsman lets it go
de Kock's away with a front foot drive towards point where the fielder dives to his right to cut off the shot
he's lucky to get away with that, is Bhuvneshwar. That was a length ball on the pads and Amla missed the glance to fine leg. The ball goes just wide of Dhoni off the pads
punched off the front foot wide of mid-off for a single
a half-volley on the pads and Amla gets off the mark with a flick to the fielder on the deep square leg boundary
he begins with a half-volley on leg stump, too easy for de Kock who leans forward and flicks it off middle to the midwicket boundary
good length on middle and off, de Kock gets behind the line and defends on the off side
sprayed wide outside off stump, first extra of the match
good length on middle and off again, de Kock stays in his crease and defends, Umesh runs across to pick up the ball
good length but on leg stump, de Kock stays back, moves across and pushes towards midwicket
poor ball, around 139kph like he has been all through the over, full on leg stump. De Kock flicks it off his pads to long leg
leans forward and plays the ball towards midwicket, that hit the inside half of the bat
good length with some width outside off, de Kock punches off the front foot but can't find the gap at cover
a fuller length on off stump, driven on the front foot to mid-off ... I don't think the ball is coming on to the bat very well so far
good length and straight, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
a full ball outside off stump, de Kock drives on the front foot to mid-off and does not time it well
that's a fluent drive off the front foot but the fielder at mid-off moves to his left and slides to prevent the ball from beating him

Has de Kock been run out? The Indians love it and think they have got him. De Kock pushed the ball to mid-off and set off but was struggling to make his ground. Kohli swooped on the ball and scored a direct hit at the bowler's end. The ball hit the base of a stump and broke it! Replays show that de Kock is just in. That long lunge saved him. He did not begin the run at a sprint but then accelerated in the nick of time.
shot! Amla stands tall inside his crease, getting on top of the bounce and square driving through point, the fielder at a wide third man runs to his right and prevents a boundary
defended on the back foot on the off side
139 kph, good length on a wicket to wicket line, Amla stays in his crease and defends
good length outside off stump, Amla stays on the back foot and angles the bat to play towards point

good ball, and well handled by Amla. Umesh pitches short of a length and gets the ball to rise and shape away just a touch, Amla moves back in his crease and begins to prod away from his body, but checks his shot in time
punched off the front foot firmly towards mid-off
de Kock tries to hit through the off side but ends up mis-timing the ball to the bowler, once again the ball isn't coming on to the bat all that well
out of nowhere Bhuvneshwar gets the ball to swerve away from the left--hander quite a bit and de Kock is beaten as he prods from the crease
shot! De Kock moves slightly forward and towards off stump to flick a full ball against the angle across him between midwicket and mid-on, lovely timing
he's split the gap at point now! De Kock stays balanced in his crease, moving towards the off side and cutting a wider ball hard to the boundary
defended back to the bowler
left alone outside the off stump
moves back and across to whip a short of a length ball off the hips behind square
142 kph, de Kock tries to drive on the up on the front foot but is beaten by a good length ball that slants across him
short of a length pitching outside leg stump, de Kock glances the ball off his hips towards fine leg
short of a length and straight, Amla plays the ball close on the leg side and has to send de Kock back
short and wide outside off stump, Amla hangs back and punches with precision, piercing the gap at cover point with his timing
pushed off the front foot to wide mid-on for a single
good length, pitching outside off and angling in, Amla meets it on the front foot and defends on the off side
Amla stays in his crease and tries to flick the ball towards square leg, he gets hit high on the thigh by one that nips back into the right-hander
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
a full ball outside off stump, driven fluently but straight to cover

short of a length and wide outside off stump, and at that pace Amla can simply help himself to a boundary, he waits on the back foot and brings that bat down in a flash of wrists, cutting the ball through point
nudged off the pads behind square, played gently enough to have enough time to run a second before the fielder at long leg can get the thrown in
good length and straight, defended on the back foot towards the bowler with a straight bat
short of a length on leg stump, de Kock whips it off his hips through midwicket and this outfield is short and extremely fast, Ashwin had little chance
a length ball with width outside off stump, hit hard off the back foot towards cover but doesn't find the gap
what has that hit? Umesh's right boot by the looks of it. De Kock drove with power on the up and Umesh was quick enough to stick his leg out
a short ball to end the over and de Kock puts it away with a pull to midwicket. This is the third consecutive over that is ending with a boundary
tossed up on middle stump, flicked from the crease to midwicket
Ashwin takes the pace off the ball, pitching outside off, Amla steps out and works the ball through square
de Kock moves forward and punches back to the bowler

that's a ripper and he's been caught at slip! From around the wicket, Ashwin drifted the ball into the left-hander with teasing flight, he pitched the ball on middle, drawing de Kock into a forward defence with his length, the ball then spun sharply away, taking the outside edge and Raina took a low catch at slip
a huge appeal for lbw after the offbreak beats Faf's forward defence and hits the pad. Was that spinning too much down leg? Might have been umpire's call.
defended on the front foot
good length outside off, Amla lets it go
Amla plays a wristy drive on the up but doesn't beat cover
good length, coming into the right-hander from over the wicket, Amla gets behind the line and blocks
good call, Amla pushed forward and dropped the ball close on the off side for a quick single
played towards square leg for a single
good length outside off, driven to mid off for a single
good length on off and middle, Amla stays leg side of the ball and defends from the crease, that was the topspinner
cut hard off the back foot but Rohit dives full length to his right at backward point to make the save, sends the batsmen back to their respective ends in a tearing hurry
defended on the front foot
a flighted ball and Amla steps out and drives along the ground to long off
that kicks a bit off the pitch and du Plessis defends a bit awkwardly
defended on the back foot
good length outside off, played from the crease towards mid-on
Amla comes forward to drive but mis-times the shot towards mid off, no pace on the ball from Binny
short ball and Amla pulls to deep square leg to bring up the fifty for South Africa
good length on off and middle, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
moves forward and outside off stump to defend a good length ball, Binny is bowling a tight line
steps out of his crease a long way to drive but plays the ball to the bowler
did that carry? Mishra dived forward but the ball dropped just short. Amla had got out of his crease ad pushed forward, nearly lobbed a catch back
driven into the covers for a single

the legbreak spins sharply and beats the right-hander, Dhoni whips off the bails. Was du Plessis' back foot grounded? That ball floated into the right-hander and then spun away considerably. The foot was grounded though.
moves deep into the crease and towards the off side to defend on the back foot
du Plesiss counters with a powerful sweep, getting low on one knee and making great contact to find the deep square leg boundary
nudged into the leg side for a single, that was a googly
but Binny is bowling a good length on a wicket to wicket line, that one seemed to straighten as well, du Plessis got a little squared up as he defended that
steps out of his crease a long way to take the ball on the half-volley and drives powerfully through extra cover for four
nudged on the leg side for a single
a length ball on middle stump, nudged off the pads in front of square leg
a fuller ball outside off, du Plessis drives on the front foot to the cover boundary, the fielder hurries to his right to cut it off
expensive over this, ends with an edge that flies wide of a slip to the third man boundary, that ball held its line just outside off stump
too short with width outside off, Amla goes back and cuts late, beating the fielder at backward point, consecutive boundaries for South Africa
the tossed up legbreak on off stump, Amla defends with soft hands from his crease and the ball rolls to slip
driven to long on for a single
good length on middle stump, de Plessis gets behind the line and defends from his crease
a fuller length on middle, leans forward and clips the ball through midwicket
pushed off the front foot through point for a single
a fuller ball on middle and off, Amla stays in his crease and plays the ball to mid-on
a length ball outside off, driven on the up through cover for a single
a full ball outside off, played off the back foot to point
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot through cover for a single
117 kph, a length ball outside off, Amla waits on the back foot to open the face and guide the ball to third man
a full ball outside off, driven on the front foot for a single to long off
punched off the back foot to long on for a single
Amla steps out and drives the ball towards midwicket
stays back and hits the ball towards cover
Raina bowled that so slow and it kept quite low, Amla made room to cut but was beaten by the lack of pace, that was so close to off stump
played to long on for a single
worked off the pads for a single behind square
good length outside off stump, punched from the crease to cover

what on earth has happened there? A 130kph delivery bowled with a cross seam kicked sharply off the pitch from a good length, hitting du Plessis on the glove as he defends. He looks at the pitch surprised
defended on the off side
117 kph now, on off stump, played with soft hands close on the off side to rotate strike
a full ball outside off, Amla leans into a fluent front-foot cover drive, Rahane dives in the infield to take pace off the shot so the fielder in the deep can prevent a boundary
once again there's some extra bounce from Binny, du Plessis stays back and adjusts better this time, playing the ball down on the off side
there's an appeal for lbw but it hit him outside off stump for leg byes towards fine leg, Amla had attempted a lap sweep ... that was an inside edge actually
played into the off side for one
punched from the crease towards mid-on, the ball does not get there because Kohli from midwicket swoops on itd
defended on the back foot on the off side
gets down low outside off and scoops the ball into the vacant space at short fine leg, the fielder from short third man runs across
driven on the front foot to long on
driven on the front foot through covers for another single
jams his bat down on a fuller ball and plays it behind point
was that an offcutter? Du Plessis stays in his crease and hits it off the back foot to cover
a length ball with width outside off, driven on the up through extra cover
123.7 kph, hit off the back foot through point for another single, South Africa able to accumulate runs without any pressure at the moment
a length ball on the pads, nudged through square leg
punched off the back foot to long on
played back to the bowler, Raina fields sharply to his left
Amla makes an effort to go leg side and drive inside out to cover, doesn't beat the infield
strays down leg side, that's a wide ...
worked off the pads for a single towards square
steps out of his crease and plays the ball towards midwicket
pushed off the front foot through mid-on
the legbreak pitches on off and spins, the batsman moves forward and defends to cover
lets the legbreak go outside off this time
tossed up outside off stump, Amla drives in the air to clear the infield at cover
goes back and works the ball off the pads through square
played into the covers, there's a fielder standing close there
defended into the covers again, only two runs off that over
cut off the back foot but can't beat the fielder at point
moves forward and towards the off side to clip the ball in front of square ... they run a quick single and a direct hit at the bowler's end might have had Amla in trouble
played into the off side for ones
steps out again and works the ball through midwicket
played to long on for a single
nudged off the pads to square leg, only three off this over
gets on the front foot and opens the face to play the ball with the turn behind point

bowled him! Mishra bowls the faster one that goes straight on, zipping through Amla's defences as he goes back to play the ball on the leg side. Clearly beaten by the change in pace. The ball deflects off the pad and hits the stumps
AB gets a googly first up that he meets on the front foot and pushes into the covers
worked off the pads behind square for a single
tossed up on off stump, driven on the front foot through cover
defended on the front foot, another economical over and a wicket
driven to long on for a single
stays in his crease and hits the ball towards point
a bit too short outside off, du Plessis stays back and has the time to place the ball into the gap on the cover boundary with a firm punch
driven to long off for a single
flat and straight, played off the back foot to midwicket
played back to the bowler on the front foot.
beaten on the front foot by a lovely, flighted legbreak that pitches on off and spins away past the outside edge of the forward defence
pushed towards point for one
slides on to leg and middle, AB comes forward and closes the face to play the ball towards square leg

what a ball that is? What has it hit? Du Plessis was rooted to his crease and once again beaten as he prodded at a flighted leg break. The ball hit the outside edge and went between the keeper and first slip. Some serious revs on that ball from Mishras
steps out to play the ball to long on
AB gets down low, moves towards the off side and paddles the ball towards fine leg
the offbreak bounces sharply too, and du Plessis defends on the off side
gets to his fifty with the first six of the game! Goes back into his crease to a flat and straight ball and heaves it over the deep midwicket boundary ... proper long hop that was
played to point off the back foot
defended towards midwicket
nudged off the front foot on the leg side
steps out of his crease and plays the ball to long on
nudged to midwicket for one
an appeal for lbw because AB moves his front foot across his crease to nudge towards leg, that was missing leg stump
tries to sweep a ball but does not make contact
there's room outside off this time and AB waits in his crease and dabs the ball late towards third man, the fielder chases and dives to prevent a four
steps out and drives the ball towards long on
AB stays in his crease and hits the ball after it slants across him from round the wicket towards cover
goes back and across to hit the ball against the legspin in front of square leg
played off the back foot behind square
played with soft hands in front of square for a single
meets the ball on the front foot and defends with a straight bat
AB strides forward and drives a flighted ball to long off
good length on off stump, defended towards the off side on the front foot
tossed up across the right-hander from round the wicket, really slow pace, defended on the off side
an appeal for lbw after AB pushes forward and is hit on the pad by an offbreak, that hit him outside the line of off stump
defended on the leg side
nudged on the leg side for one this time
worked off the pads through square leg
steps out and plays the ball to midwicket where Kohli makes a sharp stop
hit off the back foot towards long off for a single
waits on the back foot and plays the ball through point for a single
AB was all at sea there ... the legbreak pitches middle and spins through quickly past off, AB went back to hit on the off side, making room, exposing all his stumps, he was lucky not to be bowled
defended into the covers
drifts down leg side this time
driven on the front foot to long off
spin and bounce from Ashwin after angling the ball across the right-hander, the batsman is cramped for room and hit on the thigh
AB drives towards mid-on but the bowler dives and stops the shot, he seems to have hurt himself a little
played to long on for a single
dabbed with soft hands behind point and these two batsmen are so quick between the wickets
driven to long off for a single
a wide ball outside off, driven on the up to cover
bowled flat and fast on off stump, dabbed into the off side and AB has to hurry back after Faf decides he doesn't want the single, Kohli had got to the ball quickly from short extra cover
defended on the front foot
played off the back foot towards point
that was the googly and the batsman drove it on the front foot to long on ...
played on the front foot towards cover point
tossed up outside off stump, driven on the front foot through square

lbw! Umesh returns and gets the ball to jag into the right-hander from outside off, the umpire had his finger up in a flash. That ball hit the pad before the bat and it looks pretty adjacent. Looks like there is some reverse swing on offer, du Plessis played the wrong line because of the sharp movement into him, he was looking to guide it to third man
good length on off stump, defended from the crease on the off side
defended on the front foot to mid-on
a length ball on leg and middle, Miller moves forward and across to work the ball through midwicket
presses forward to a good length ball that slants across him from over the wicket and plays to point
a wider delivery outside off stump, Miller lets it go
moves forward and across to nudge the ball gently through square leg and they race back for the second
worked off the pads behind square for one more
defended on the front foot to the bowler
hit off the back foot to long off
AB moves forward and across to play the ball to midwicket
that's his first boundary and it's quite a shot! Ab steps out of his crease to get closer to the pitch of the ball and then golf-swings it over the deep midwicket boundary, cleared it comfortably
good length just outside off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
Miller moves forward and works the ball towards square leg
the ball swings into the right-hander, AB nudges off the pads for a single through square
dabbed off the back foot towards point
played towards mid-on
flicked off the pads through square for a single to keep the strike
steps out of his crease to take the ball on the full an drives straight, Binny stoops in his follow through and makes the save
strays down leg side, that's a wide
a length ball on off and middle, AB plays it with the angle into him towards long on
a slower ball at 112 kph on the pads, nudged behind square for two, Miller tapped that gently so had time to come back
a length ball outside off stump, punched off the back foot towards long off
good length on off and middle, AB moves forward and across to defend on the leg side, Binny is bowling with a cross seam so it doesn't come on to the bat after gripping the pitch
AB steps a long way out of his crease but can't connect because the ball slips down leg side
advances down the pitch again and then pushes a length ball towards cover point
driven on the up off the front foot to the off side
Umesh gets the ball to nip into AB from outside off, AB gets into a tangle while defending and the ball drops at his feet, he manages to boot it away from his stumps
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot through cover for a single
Miller tries to turn the ball on the leg side but gets a leading edge towards mid-off for a quick single
a fuller ball tails into the right-hander, AB drives but can't beat mid-on
wide outside off stump, AB stays in his crease and slaps the ball towards the cover boundary, they return for the second as the throw comes in
good length delivery cuts across the left-hander, Miller is beaten
flicked off the pads behind square for a single
dabbed off the back foot towards point for a single, but there's a direct hit at the bowler's end. AB was home safe, an easy decision for the third umpire to make
driven on the front foot to long off for a single
the slower ball is too short, AB goes deep into his crease and pulls the ball far over the midwicket boundary, such a clean strike
played off the pads behind square leg
hit on the up into the covers
AB pulls the short of a length ball towards deep square leg, where Mishra runs to his left and manages to tap the ball down, preventing it from bouncing past him
another pull, along the ground to deep square leg, Mishra has to do less running this time, the ball comes straight to him
Miller is cramped for room by one that jags back into the left-hander, Miller drops the ball at his feet and AB sprints through
a length ball on off and middle, AB stays in his crease and taps the ball towards long on
Miller steps out to try and hit on the leg side but gets an inside edge on to the pad
AB goes back and opens the face as he cuts, placing the ball into the gap behind point so he can come back for the second
tossed up on middle stump, AB comes forward and waits a touch to drive to long off

Miller's been stumped by a mile! He charged Mishra to try and hit him for six over the leg side but was beaten by the dipping legbreak that spun towards him and went through the gap between bat and body, Dhoni had so much time to break the stumps, Miller did not even try to make it back
Duminy gets down low outside off and laps the sweep around the corner towards fine leg
bowled flat and a bit short, AB goes back and pulls the ball towards deep midwicket
punched off the back foot towards long on, SA get to 200
driven on the front foot towards mid-off but can;t beat the fielder
pushed with softer hands towards mid off for a quick single
AB gets to his fifty by lofting the ball towards long off, there's a fumble from the fielder and he comes back for the second. Kanpur applauds.
driven to long on for a single
banged in short and Duminy manages to keep his short-arm pull down though he seemed to take his eyes off it when he turned his head
the ball swings on to AB's pads and he helps it along to the fine leg boundary with a neat glance
driven through the covers for a single
bowled outside leg from round the wicket, AB stays back and hits it through square leg
tossed up into the left-hander, there's a slip in place, Duminy dabs towards point for a single
tossed up on leg and middle, turned off the pads towards square leg
defended on the front foot
dabbed off the pads on the leg side
a length ball outside off, driven on the up to long off for a single
nudged off the hips on the leg side
the ball nips into the right-hander from outside off, AB dabs it behind square, close to the keeper, and runs
banged in short, is that the first bouncer of the day? I can't remember another one. Duminy ducks under it
Duminy steps out to turn the ball towards the leg side but misses and is hit on the pad
a fuller and straighter ball, driven to long on for a single
driven back to the bowler, Binny fields in his follow through, he's bowling a tight line and length

that isn't tight at all, a length ball around middle and off, Duminy moves forward and across and slogs across the line, smashing the ball over the square leg boundary, he hit that from well outside off
worked off the hips behind square for a single
AB clears his front foot and pulls the short ball through midwicket, finds the gap on the boundary
AB is turning it on now, nitro mode. Once again he clears his front foot and lofts a fuller ball over the fielder at long-on. Not perfectly timed, but still so good

the timing on this is outstanding, steps out of his crease and slaps a short of a length ball flat over extra cover and into the gap on the boundary. 21 runs off the overs. AB has ruined Binny's decent outing.
and once again he strikes first ball! Duminy chased a very wide ball with a slash - no footwork - and gets a thin edge through to Dhoni. Ordinary ball, ordinary shot, simple catch
Behardien gets an inside edge as he tries to dab the ball on the off side, the ball drops on the pitch and Umesh gets to it quickly to keep AB off the strike
played on the up to mid off, another dot ball and more less delivery that AB will face, he is itching for the strike
Behardien turns a full ball off his pads behind square and returns for the second
played close on the off side, Behardien wants the single but gets sent back
played through point for a single. India will be thrilled with that over, no strike for AB and he is off strike for the start of the next one
a full ball on off stump and Behardien finally gives AB the strike with a drive to long off
AB pulls a shorter ball flat towards deep midwicket and gets only the single, not timed perfectly
short ball with width outside off stump, Behardien gets under it and chips it in the air between the keeper and short third man for a boundary
played through the off side for a single
a full delivery outside off, driven through cover for a single
Behardien keeps the strike by cutting a length ball through point
shot! The full ball swings into the right-hander and Behardien makes a bit of room by clearing his front foot and then drives powerfully through extra cover
played to the fielder at midwicket, that ball was straighter
Behardien gets beaten as he tries to smash the ball through the off side, he needs to just take a single and cede centrestage to his captain
or not! Behardien once again finds the boundary, using the width to free his arms, making room by clearing his front foot and driving to the cover boundary
dabbed close on the off side for a single
a loose ball, a full toss, AB clears his front foot to create hitting room and mows it to the wide long-on boundary
slogs the ball down the ground to turn the strike over
he's going to get a hundred here! The yorker misses the length and AB moves his front foot towards the leg side and slaps the low full toss high and far over the bowler's head
and again! AB gets under a length ball and golf-swings it high, and just far enough to clear Raina at long on
Dhoni does well to save a four! AB slashed hard at a full toss outside off stump and got a thick edge that bounced before Dhoni, who dived to his right
another low full toss outside off and AB slices it high over point, there's protection in the deep though
another full toss and AB carves it high over point, Rahane runs along the boundary and taps it back into play but the ball rolls on to the rope
Behardien is now playing a superb cameo, lofting a length ball crisply back over the bowler's head, superbly placed
another one! Behardien moves forward to drive a low full toss through cover and into the gap on the boundary ... will he give AB the strike for a 100?
Behardien smashes the slower ball! Waiting deep in his crease, getting under the delivery and using a lot of bottom hand to loft the ball over long off
and now Behardien plays the ball into the covers and gives AB the strike, and listen to that roar from the Kanpur crowd. Is that for AB? Or for the fact that it wasn't a boundary? It's for AB.
a good length ball at serious pace with good bounce, AB turns his head away as he slogs across the line and misses

he gets the 100 off the final ball with a six over long on! What a legend he is, AB de Villiers. He takes his team past 300 too. The last shot was a flat-batted swipe over long on, didn't look pretty but he is so balanced when he plays such shots. India have been shredded in the last five overs.

inn2.comm: full ball on off stump, Rohit meets it on the front foot and plays with a straight bat to mid-on
good length and straight, Rohit tries to defend but collects a single on the leg side via an inside edge
good length just outside off stump, Dhawan comes forward and plays a punchy drive to mid-off
a wider ball on a full length, Dhawan tries to play the big front-foot drive through cover but is beaten
punched off the back foot towards backward point where Miller dives to his right and bounces up immediately with the ball in hand to prevent the single
a cracking square drive, Dhawan threads the length ball with perfect timing through the cover point region
good length just outside off stump, driven to mid off on the front foot
good length on off and middle, defended with a straight bat towards the bowler
worked off the pads on the leg side
not much room outside off but Rohit manages to cut the short of a length ball towards third man
angles the ball into Dhawan, who closes the face of the bat and plays on the leg side
a sharp bouncer at 137kph, Dhawan ducks under it
the good length ball angles into Rohit and then seams away off the pitch at pace, Rohit pushes forward to defend and is beaten
a straighter line this time, Rohit works the ball off his hips behind square
Dhawan drives the length ball crisply to cover where the fielder dives and deflects the ball towards mid-off, a bit of a mix up between the batsmen while calling
punched firmly towards cover point, can't find the gap again
short of a length and straight, Dhawan rolls his wrists and swats the ball down behind square leg
good length delivery outside off stump, Rohit punches the ball towards cover
angles the ball into the left-hander from round the wicket, Dhawan tries to turn the ball off his pads but makes no contact
good length on off and middle stump at 138kph, Dhawan plays it back to the bowler with a straight bat
banged in short but it is far down leg side, too far away for Dhawan to swivel and pull, but he tried
another short ball and this time Dhawan connects, pulling the ball in the air and just over Behardien at square leg
worked off the back foot with the angle into him towards square leg
sublime timing, Rohit hangs back to a short of a a length ball and drives through cover point, this outfield is extremely quick
a fuller length on off stump, punched off the front foot to cover
driven on the up towards cover
edged and four! Dhawan drives away from his body at a full ball and gets a thick edge that flies wide of the keeper and too fine for third man
short of a length from wide of the crease, angling into the left-hander, Dhawan stays back and blocks
too short and the line is poor, on leg stump, Dhawan swivels and pulls, beating Tahir on the long leg boundary
the slower ball strays down leg side and brushes Dhawan's pads as he tries to glance, de Kock collects
good length outside off stump, Dhawan gets behind the line and defends
uses the angle into him to nudge the ball off the pads towards midwicket
defended from the crease towards mid-off
punched off the back foot towards mid-off, once again
a slower and fuller ball, Dhawan plays it back to the bowler
strays down leg side this time, another wide
banged in short, it did not get too high, Dhawan muscles the pull but hits it towards the man at midwicket
another short ball goes for four, this around the wicket line is not working for Rabada. Dhawan gets on top of the bounce and rolls his wrists to pull the ball along the ground through square leg
a full and wide ball, Rohit meets it on the front foot and opens the face to drive through point for four
defended on the off side
gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends with a straight bat to the bowler
width outside off stump, Rohit waits in his crease and dabs the ball late, beats short third man easily
dabbed on the front foot for a single towards the off side
a full ball on the pads, flicked to the man at deep square leg
a good length ball cramping Dhawan for room, he plays it towards point
a fuller ball outside off, Dhawan presses forward and drives to mid-off

given lbw! But was that missing leg? The ball was quite full from round the wicket, angling into the left-hander. Dhawan was caught on the crease and hit on the pad as he looked to play on the leg side. Morkel went up immediately, and the umpire followed after a short pause ... it did look like that would have missed leg stump, or just about clipped it.
worked off the pads behind square for a single
short of a length outside off stump, left alone by Rohit
138kph, in the blockhole, Rohit stays in his crease and defends on the off side
turned off the pads towards the leg side
strays down leg side, that's a wide
a loud appeal for a strangle down the leg side, think that brushed Rahane's thigh pad as he tried to glance
good length outside off stump, defended firmly on the front foot
a cracking drive from Rahane, he hit that so hard into the ground that the ball bounced over the head of the leaping fielder at cover and raced to the boundary
good length and closer to the batsman, he defends on the front foot
stays back to a short of a length delivery and dabs the ball towards third man
driven on the up on the front foot towards cover
worked off the pads through square leg for a single, India bring up their 50
that's too wide outside off stump
full ball with width outside off, Rohit leans forward and plays a square drive behind point, Tahir's dive on the boundary is unsuccessful
too full and way too much with, Rohit glides on to the front foot and plays such an elegant cover drive. Ordinary ball, outstanding shot
good length outside off, Rohit lets it go
once again Rohit lets the good length ball go outside off
played to long on for a single
tossed up on off and middle, Rohit leans forward and taps the ball towards long on
another single to long on, Rahane moves forward and drives a full ball
a full ball on off stump, once again the batsmen just pushes it to long on off the front foot
defended on the front foot, Duminy's length was a little shorter and his pace quicker
a full delivery with lots of room to drive, Rahane strides out and hits the ball through cover, Amla slides and saves the boundary in the deep
119 kph, a slower ball, Rohit came forward a touch too early but waited and defended the ball well towards the off side
poor line, on the pads, all Rohit needs to do is turn it around the corner and he does it with a deft glance
steered to third man for a single
good length on off stump, pushed from the crease towards cover
another slower ball, 122kph, Rahane plays the ball to the bowler
another slow one, 125kph, Rabada is rolling his wrist over the ball as he delivers, Rahane comes forward and plays it to mid off
tossed up on off and middle, played back to the bowler on the front foot
defended from the crease on the leg side
he gives Duminy the charge, gets to the pitch of the ball, and hoists the ball far over the short long-on boundary with a free swing of the arms
steps out again but plays a defensive shot this time towards mid-on
Duminy moves quickly to his right to cut off a front-foot punch from Rahane
paddles the ball around the corner for a single
that's a high full toss, Rahane plays it towards midwicket, he was out of his crease as he played that so not a no-ball
dabs the ball towards backward point, Rahane wanted one but Rohit said no
a short ball, Rahane swats it towards midwicket, keeps it along the ground
short of a length with width outside off, dabbed down to third man off the back foot
good length on off and middle, defended from the crease on the leg side
pushed off he front foot towards point, opened the face of the bat just enough to beat the diving fielder at backward point
punched off the back foot and they stroll a single once the ball beats Amla's dive from midwicket
strays far down leg side that time, Rahane tries to paddle but is passes him and also beats de Kock for five wides
punched off the back foot uppishly past the bowler, diving to his right at full stretch, he got fingers on the ball but not enough to grasp it
played to midwicket for a single
a full ball on off stump, driven to long on for a single
goes back in his crease and works the ball in front of square, Rohit wanted one but gets sent back
nudged off the front foot to long on
good length outside off, Rohit presses forward and drives on the up to mid off
the slow ball ends up as a high full toss that dips below waist height, Rohit jumps back and taps the ball through square leg
width offered outside off stump, cut into the deep for a single to bring up the 50 stand
reaches out for a short and very wide ball and chips it over point, giving Tahir work on the boundary
short of a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
good length and straight, driven on the up to mid-off
loopy ball on off, Rahane inches forward and defends it
Tahir attempts a googly and drags it fractionally short. Rahane goes low and sweeps it through backward square leg
Rohit seeks to drive this legbreak and skews it to midwicket off an inside edge
Tahir drops it short again, this is tagged with hitting room. Rohit camps on the back foot and sends it scurrying past the covers with a firm cut... Even AB can't cut that off
Tahir gives this more air, dabbed towards point
Rohit strides forward to meet this full ball, which is calmly blocked back to Tahir
Morne hits that customary back of a length, the line is outside off. Rahane stands tall and punches it straight to point
Morne sucks pace off this back-of-a-length ball outside off. 123ks, Rahane waits on it, opens the face and dabs a single down to third man to bring up India's 100
shortish and hurries on off at 140ks, Rohit can only chop it to point
short, loads of width and Rohit likes it there. Morne hurls it short and wide outside off. Rohit opens the face of the bat and carves it over backward point for his fifty
much fuller and straighter, Rohit checks his flick and finds the teeny weeny gap between midwicket and mid-on
Morne roars an appeal for lbw, the umpire, though, does not budge. Fullish and curls in, Rohit aims to play across the line and misses the flick. Sliding down leg..
straight roller on middle, nudged to square leg
fullish ball on middle, Rohit presses forward and taps it to mid-off
looks like a googly, comes back in. Rohit hangs back and milks a single in front of midwicket
pushed through flatter and quicker, bunted to the leg side for one
looped up on middle, Rohit drives it smoothly to long-off
Tahir shortens his length, Rahane is wary of it as he sits back and plays a whippy punch behind square on the leg side
back of a length and outside off, Rahane plays a punchy drive to short cover, where Faf flings to his right and makes a sharp save
good length and outside off, Rahane drives firmly but hits it straight into the covers
dug in shortish and outside off, Rahane cuts it to the off-side sweeper for one
slower ball outside off at 121ks, Rohit spots it, waits for it, and then steers it down to third man
back of a length and around off, Rahane twirls it behind square leg for one
Morne offers a full toss, Rohit misses out on the loose ball. He looks to force it away but can only mis-hit it back to the bowler
cut off the back foot but can't beat the man at point
a full ball on middle, driven to long on for one more
the legbreak outside off stump, flat through the air, dabbed off the back foot to short third man
slower ball, the legbreak pitches on middle this time, Rohit defends on the front foot
defended on the front foot again into a gap on the leg side
tossed up on off and middle, Rahane moves forward and drives through midwicket
good length on middle and off, Rahane stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
pushed off the front foot towards mid on
a full ball with some movement into the right-hander, Rahane pushes to mid-on once again
good length on off and middle, Rahane stays in his crease and blocks
a full ball on the pads, flicked uppishly through square leg
played off the front foot towards mid-on
defended back to the bowler
gets down on one knee and plays a swatty sweep down to long leg
leans forward and flicks a full ball towards wide long on
steps out of his crease to a full toss and lofts it inside out over extra cover, chipping into the gap on the boundary
driven to long on for a single
defended on the front foot
a full ball tails down the leg side, wide called
good length and straight, Rahane moves forward and drives to long off and runs
a full ball on the pads, clipped to midwicket
driven on the front foot towards cover
short of a length outside off and Rohit pulls the ball through square leg
flicked off the front foot towards midwicket
good length around off, Steyn is getting the ball to move into the right-hander, Rahane plays it towards midwicket
Rohit tries to drive but gets an outside edge to short third man
driven on the front foot to cover
a good length ball at gentle pace on off stump, driven from the crease into the covers
driven off the front foot towards wide long on but it does not get there because midwicket cuts it off
driven past the fielder in the circle at cover, Amla fields in the deep
A short ball outside off, a hit-me-please delivery, Rahane pulls it to the wide long on boundary
played to deep midwicket for two more
tucked off the pads through square leg for one more
a full and straight delivery, Rahane gets on to the front foot and drives straight, Steyn stops the ball with his boot
a length ball on off and middle, Rahane plays it to long on for a single
the good length ball around off stops on Rohit a bit, he adjusts and defends the ball towards point
Steyn dives across during his follow through to try and stop Rohit's push down the ground but he can't cut it off
played to midwicket
tapped off the pads towards the leg side
Rahane plays the ball to short cover
punched off the back foot towards cover
Rahane ruins the over for the bowler by getting down low and opening the face to steer a full and wide ball past short third man, that shot brings up the 100 prtnership
strays down leg side for a wide
pushed off the front foot into the covers
tossed up on off stump, Rahane drives firmly to the bowler and Tahir can't make a clean stop
defended on the leg side
a fuller length delivery, driven towards wide long on for one

the legbreak beats Rohit in the flight as he stretches forward to defend, it then dips and spins past the outside edge, Quinton de Kock breaks the stumps, but Rohit did not take his back foot outside the crease at all
a full ball outside off, the batsmen comes forward and drives fluently to wide long off
a low full toss, flicked through square leg for a single
cut off the back foot towards deep cover
Rohit waits in his crease for a flat ball from round the wicket and hits it to long on
goes back and towards leg and makes room to hit the ball through cover point
a cracking slog sweep from Rohit! He got down really low and took the ball from outside off stump, hitting the ball against the angle from round the wicket over deep square leg
reaches for a wide one outside off and drives the ball through point
dabbed with soft hands behind point for a single
driven off the front foot through extra cover for a single
a full ball on middle and leg, nudged off the pads through square leg
pushed towards long off for another single
nudged down to long on to bring up a half-century, it's taken him 67 balls, well played but India need him to kick on
Excellent placement, it was a flighted googly and Rohit lofts it inside out over extra cover for four

and again, only this time he's hit it for six! Rohit makes room and lofts the ball inside out over extra cover, superb timing and the outfield is a small one to clear. It was the legbreak this time but that did not matter
good length on off and middle, played to mid-on
punched uppishly through point for a single
a length ball with width outside off, Rohit reaches for it and opens the face to steer behind point towards third man
driven fluently on the up through extra cover
turned off the pads towards midwicket
good length around off stump, Rohit tries to punch down the ground but gets an inside edge on the leg side
a half-volley outside off stump and Rahane beats the fielder on the cover boundary with a fluent drive off the front foot, too much room from the bowler
drags his length shorter and so Rahane waits on the back foot and turns the ball off his pads through square
punched through point for a single
pushed towards midwicket from the crease
that swung a bit, the batsman stays in his crease and defends
a length ball on off and middle, driven to long on for a single
good length around off stump, Rahane stays in his crease and punches towards point
good length, angling into middle from outside off, nudged off the pads past midwicket for a single to wide mid-on
poor line, strays on to the pads and Rohit plays the glance towards fine leg
the ball cuts into the right-hander, who was trying to push down the ground but gets an inside edge towards square leg
full toss on the pads, glanced once again towards long leg
good length outside off stump, Rahane tries to dab on the off side but gets an inside edge on the leg side, he wasn't quite sure where that went
driven on the front foot towards long off
short of a length delivery, Rahane swipes across the line and doesn't make proper contact, hits it to short fine leg
cut off the back foot towards point, doesn't find the gap
a soft dismissal to break the stand! Rahane made room by moving outside leg and slapped an innocuous delivery straight to Miller at extra cover. His partnership with Rohit ends on 149
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot to the bowler
flicked off the pads through square leg for a single
Morkel flirts with the wide line, and the umpire says he's on the wrong side of it outside off
Kohli reaches for a wide ball outside off and drives to deep point
hits a good length outside off and cuts back into the right-hander, beating Rohit's inside edge as he tries to cut
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot on the off side
Rohit tries to defend a ball that jags into him from a good length outside off and gets an inside edge on to the thigh, he played that from the crease
a fuller length outside off, Rohit meets it on the front foot and defends solidly
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
nudged off a middle stump line in front of square to rotate strike

Rohit gets to his hundred by flicking a full ball flat over midwicket's head, and beating the fielding diving after chasing from long on ... he's played such a fluent innings today, looked in no trouble whatsoever, off only 98 balls
driven on the up to cover
driven on the front foot to extra cover
worked off the pads through square leg
driven to long on for a single
dabbed off the back foot behind square for a single
the legbreak pitches middle and spins towards off, bowled flat though, the batsman pushes towards the off side, the keeper runs to field
bowled flatter and quicker outside off, Rohit tries to cut and is beaten
Rohit gets squared up and beaten by a legbreak that pitches on middle and spins past the outside edge of his forward push
played through the covers for one
a googly and Kohli turns the ball off the pads towards square leg, Rohit hares down for a single but Kohli sends him back, Rohit turns and sprints back and manages to beat the direct hit quite easily
good length around off stump, driven to mid off but not timed well
the ball nips in from a good length and Rohit drives with a straight bat past the bowler, mid-off does the fielding
good length outside off, Kohli stays in his crease, moves a bit across and plays the ball towards mid on
driven firmly towards the bowler, Steyn can't get his legs out of the way in time and the ball deflects off his boot to mid-on. That hit his shin actually, must have stung.
a full ball outside off, Kohli strides forward and drives through cover
tight wicket to wicket bowling from Steyn, Kohli stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
superb fielding on the boundary from Behardien, he ran a long way from long on towards deep midwicket and dived to stop the ball with one hand, Rohit had flicked that crisply, saved three runs
defended on the off side
played off the front foot to cover
Kohli manages to hit the ball through the gap at cover this time
pushed off the front foot towards long on for a single
stays back and dabs the ball from very close to off stump towards short third man, Kohli think about a single but Rohit says no
driven firmly along the ground but straight to mid-off
good length on off stump, the batsman moves forward and drives to long on for a single
a length ball outside off, Kohli square drives through point for a single
full and straight, the batsman mis-times the drive down the ground and the ball sputters towards long on
turned off the pads through midwicket, the call is for two and that's what they get, Steyn wasn't too happy about the fielding effort

has he been caught at short fine leg? What a take! Steyn bowled a half-volley on the pads, a delivery Kohli should have put away. He flicked the ball uppishly but it was dying on the tall Morne Morkel at short fine leg. Morkel got down low and caught the ball in his fingertips before it hit the ground. Is the tide turning decisively now?
riven uppishly through extra cover for a single
Dhoni runs down the track an taps the ball towards long on for a single
Rohit has got to play a huge role from here if India are going to win this and he winds up and slams Tahir powerfully, flat over the midwicket boundary
driven along the ground to long on for a single
driven on the front foot to long off for one more
nudged off the front foot to long on, ten runs off that over
good length delivery aimed outside off, Rohit gets on his toes and wristily flicks to deep square leg
back of a length but strays on Dhoni's pads, it pings off his thigh pad and rolls towards fine leg. Dhoni is quick to call Rohit back for the second
calmly pushes the fullish delivery to long-on
is that six? Poor delivery from Rabada. Back of a length on Rohit's rib cage with fine leg up. All Rohit needs to do is get bat on it and that he does, lands just inside the boundary too.
pressure on Rabada. Fires one down leg side now. Called wide
better lines. Good length outside off, Rohit chops one down to third man for an easy single
another poor delivery. Short and wide with third man up but Dhoni pats the ball to backward point
a good length ball cramps Rohit for room, he tucks it behind square for one more
good length just outside off, Dhoni simply waits in his crease and pushes the ball into the gap at cover
a fuller ball on middle, Rohit moves across and swats the ball off his pads towards Steyn at long leg

oh dear, there is chaos all round in the middle but the batsmen are safe in the end. Dhoni dabbed the ball towards point where the substitute Phangiso got to the ball quickly. Dhoni ran for the single, Rohit did not want it, Dhoni stopped, and then Rohit ran, both batsmen were in the middle of the pitch but de Kock had not come up to the stumps, he collected the throw near short leg and missed the underarm back at the stumps. Rohit would have been out despite his tired dive.
pushed down the ground for one
played to long on for a single
worked off the pads behind square for a single
Rohit swipes across the line but does not make proper contact, the ball gets to the fielder at deep midwicket on the first bounce
a slower ball, Dhoni nudges it to midwicket and gives Rohit the strike
139 kph and that's disappeared! Rohit is ready and waiting for the short ball on the front foot and he swivels and pulls to the deep backward square leg boundary, it pitches just short of the rope
dabbed towards third man for one
good length at 137kph outside off stump, Dhoni stands in his crease and swipes away from is body, wasn't close to hitting that well

Rohit's doing this entirely off his own bat now, he moves towards the off side and flicks the length ball from outside off stump and just manages to clear Rabada on the square leg boundary, I think Rabada mis-judged that chance
goes inside out this time and chips the ball over cover
jumps down the track and gets into a tangle because he has no room to play the delivery angling into him, gets an inside edge on the leg side
stays in his crease and hits the ball towards cover
played with soft hands towards cover, the fielder is on the edge of the circle
Dhoni is caught in an awkward half-forward position as he pushes a good length ball towards midwicket
pulled towards deep midwicket, two fielders converge on the ball and there's a bit of a fumble which allows a second
pulled over square leg! He simply swats a short of a length ball, using Steyn's pace to full effect. These two have now added 50, Dhoni's made 8 ...
played into the off side for a single
in the blockhole, Dhoni makes room and axes the ball down the ground to long on
Rohit punches the good length ball firmly to Amla at cover to take the single and bring up his 150 ... he's done tremendously for India today, they need him to see this through
Dhoni hacks the ball to cover, where Amla fields, no single but Rohit will have the strike

he's been caught and bowled! Rohit stepped out of his crease but was beaten by the flight of the legbreak, he wasn't to the pitch of the ball and ended up punching it tamely right back at Tahir, who sets off on an epic celebratory run after taking the catch. He'll tire himself out on such a hot day!
pushed off the front foot to long on for a single
a full toss on the pads, Dhoni simply taps it towards deep square leg, a younger him might have blitzed that
mis-times the slog sweep - the ball was a bit full - and Raina manages to force the ball off the inside edge towards deep square leg

Tahir has got another one! Raina has barely had a chance to get his eye in but he can't afford to either. He aims to slam a googly over the midwicket boundary and ends up mis-hitting it towards long on, where Duminy takes the catch
Binny strides forward and defends the final ball of the over. What a finish from Tahir, two wickets and four runs in his tenth over
turned a length ball off his pads behind square but Morkel fumbles the sliding stop at short fine leg and allows a second
played with very soft hands into the midwicket region, which is empty, and the batsmen have fresh legs to sprint back for the second
two more! Superb running. Dhoni jumps towards the leg side and cuts the ball through point, the fielder in the deep can't get the ball back quickly enough
dabs it straight to short third man and runs a single
a length ball on the pads, turned behind square off the pads for a leg bye
good length and straight, Dhoni hits the ball off the front foot to midwicket
once more Dhoni's legs make up for what his bat can't do, he just taps the ball gently towards midwicket, where the fielder is on the boundary, and sprints through for two ...

good length ball angles into Dhoni and he gets hit on the thigh as he tries to turn the ball towards square, they run a leg bye as the ball drops at Dhoni's feet. Dhoni seems to be in a little discomfort, holding his side
the full ball swings into the right-hander, Binny drives to long -on
Dhoni finally has a boundary! He moves across towards the off side, gets down low, and scoops the ball from outside off to the fine leg boundary
Dhoni steps out of his crease and slaps the length ball to deep cover, where Amla can't prevent the second
cut hard but Phangiso dives to his left at point and makes a crucial save, that was headed to the boundary
a fumble from Behardien at deep midwicket gives Dhoni the second run and the strike! Dhoni had swiped across the line at a short of a length ball and made good contact
Dhoni charges and is cramped for room as he pulls, the ball goes to deep midwicket, just the single this time, Binny will have the strike
Binny flat bats the ball past Rabada, not timing it well, over to Dhoni now. Seven needed off three balls.

Dhoni has been caught and bowled! This is an innings that will be discussed for a while now. He's charged the young fast bowler and aimed a slog across the line, he top edged the ball high in the air and Rabada calls for it coolly and takes the catch. Dhoni fails to see India through, they need seven off two balls.

Rabada has all but done it for South Africa! Binny also too edges the pull and skies the catch to square leg, Rabada tries to go for it himself again, but leaves it to Amla who comes running in to catch it.
the final ball is limply hit past the bowler for a single. Rabada stands tall in a high pressure situation, defending 11 in the final over to give South Africa a 1-0 lead
